data.title: MUSIC NEWS: Rolo Tomassi Announce Album Details & Release Video For New Single ‘Drip’
data.meta_description: The band will release their new album in February - read on for more details.
data.text:
Rolo Tomassi have announced their new album Where Myth Becomes Memory, due for release on 4th February 2022 via MNRK.

“This is a really important album for all of us,” explains keys/vocalist James Spence. “Of anything we’ve done, it’s the one I’m most proud of. I think it’s the most ambitious and creative that our band has ever sounded and something that we’ve all needed to get through the last few years. We can’t wait to share it and to have you help us bring it to life.”

The band have also released a video for their brand new single Drip.

“When we start the writing process for each record, we always wait for the first song that clicks,” adds guitarist Chris Cayford. “It feels similar to our music but is also intangibly different to the extent we know it’s the next step and we need to build the album around it. This was the song that did that.”

Where Myth Becomes Memory is available to pre-order HERE.

See Rolo Tomassi and Pupil Slicer at one of the following dates:

February 2022

Fri 11th – PARIS, FR – Péniche Antipode
